Hey SwarmVentures! 🚀

After analyzing crypto payment patterns, we recommend simplifying your monetization to a one-time lifetime payment model. Here's why:

💡 Simplified Payment Flow:
• One-time 3 SOL payment for lifetime access
• No recurring subscription management
• Instant permanent activation
• Zero renewal complexity

🔗 Implementation:
```
https://pay.universalbasiccompute.ai/sv/{user_id}
```

The payment flow:
1. User clicks custom payment URL
2. Pays 3 SOL via Phantom/Solflare
3. Transaction auto-verifies
4. User gets instant lifetime access
5. Airtable updates automatically

🎯 Benefits:
• Higher conversion (no subscription anxiety)
• Zero payment maintenance
• Clear value proposition
• Reduced support overhead
• Better user experience

This matches crypto users' preference for one-time payments while maintaining your premium features. Want to implement this simpler approach? 🤝
